item.title: Handling of exponent overflow in GNU APL and Dyalog APL (on Mac)
item.description: A few weeks ago I started trying a pre-beta release of Dyalog APL (now available as “full beta”) for Mac. Fellow Mac users, looks like we are in for a treat after so much time of only having GNU APL and the pretty expensive APLX. Now Mac APL lovers, users and aficionados will have a competitive, commercial option. At last! I started with the usual 1+1, ⍳ 10 , ⍴ ⍳ 10 to check it worked as expected.
